thread.title: UK Airport Car Parks Says Holidaymakers Can Grab Up To 70 Per Cent Off Greek Holidays
thread.title_full: UK Airport Car Parks Says Holidaymakers Can Grab Up To 70 Per Cent Off Greek Holidays

author: prbuzz.com
title: UK Airport Car Parks Says Holidaymakers Can Grab Up To 70 Per Cent Off Greek Holidays
text:
Greece has become very unpopular for holidaymakers due to its recent financial problems, leaving travel agents with tens of thousands of unsold package holidays.
A leading travel expert, UK Airport Car Parks is advising consumers looking for a great family holiday deal to book a Greece before the prices go up.
The cheap airport car parking experts who have been advising holidaymakers on what action to take when visiting Greece has said travel agents are struggling to sell package holidays to the popular holiday destination. That has left travel agents with tens of thousands of unsold holidays, which has resulted in the high street travel agent dropping their prices by up to 70%
An insider at a high street travel agent has told UK Airport Car Parks ( http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk ); the big discounts are to encourage people to start booking Greece again for their holiday.
Each year 2 million people travel to Greece from the UK, but this year that number has dropped. Holidaymakers have become worried about travelling to Greece for their holiday that has resulted in over 33,000 people cancelling or changing their holiday to Greece.
Chris Fryer from UK Airport Car Parks said: “The big discounts for holidays to Greece will only be available for a limited time. We are advising people who want a great deal to book now before prices go up to their normal price.”
The UK Airport car parking experts has been offering advice for people thinking of visiting Greece for their holidays; that advice can be found at http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/blog/advice-for-holidays-in-greece
Although Greece has had serious financial problems, it should not affect holidaymakers who are looking for a great holiday.
To learn more about UKairportcarparks.co.uk, and how to save money on parking a car at a UK airport, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/ or to read the tips on how to have cheaper holidays, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/blog/tips-on-cheaper-holidays /
About UK Airport Car Parks
UK Airport Car Parks provides car owners with a comparison site that allows them to find secure airport car parks at up to 60% cheaper than the normal price.
